Welcome to the exciting world of the Maze Game for MacOS!

To begin your adventure, simply open the a.out file using your terminal.
You can do this by navigating to the folder where the file is located and typing "./a.out" into the terminal, then hitting enter.

Alternatively, you can simply drag and drop the a.out file onto the terminal icon, and the game will launch automatically. Get ready to navigate through a labyrinthine world full of challenges and excitement - the fun is just beginning!
